This property verifies that all internal registers are reset to zero when the active-high reset signal rst_i is asserted. 

The assertion triggers on every rising edge of the clock signal clk_i, but is disabled when rst_i is low. When rst_i becomes high, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, all four signals - button_1, button_2, count, and button_o - must simultaneously be zero.
